certifications.title: Microsoft Certified: Azure Fundamentals
certifications.description: Issued by Microsoft, this certification verifies that I have a foundational knowledge of cloud services and how those services are provided with Microsoft Azure.

certifications.title: GitHub Foundations
certifications.description: Issued by GitHub, this certification verifies that I have a foundational knowledge of GitHub and how to use it.

certifications.title: React Fundamentals
certifications.description: Issued by Udacity, this certification verifies that I have a foundational knowledge of React and how to use it.

degrees.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Science in Information Technology

societies.title: Honor Societies
societies.description: I have been inducted into two honor societies; the National Society of Leadership and Success (NSLS) and Alpha Sigma Lambda.

list.title: SNHU Presidents List
list.description: I have been named to the SNHU Presidents List 4 times.
list.details: Eligibility for the SNHU Presidents List requires full-time undergraduate students who have earned a grade-point average of at least 3.7 for each paired 8-week term.

list.title: SNHU Honor Roll
list.description: I have been named to the SNHU Honor Roll for the past 9 terms.
list.details: Eligibility for the SNHU Honor Roll requires that a student earn a grade point average of at least 3.5 for the 8-week term.

link.title: Merit Pages
link.description: View my SNHU Presidents List and Honor Roll achievements at meritpages.com/eslutz.

workRecognition.description: Recognition from leaders and peers at Rocket Mortgage

recognition.description: I received recognition as team member of the month in the Engineering Experience department by exemplifying the Rocket Mortgage ISM "We are the they."
recognition.quote: Eric is a Team Member who is always willing to jump in, lend a hand or help a TM in need. He goes out of his way to help and support TM's even if the area is not one he has experience in. He is passionate about helping others, lending a hand and helping to move the needle.

recognition.alt: Organizing the process and sharing it
